word: Do you ask, \93How am I to abide in Christ?\94 In the same way as you received Him at first. \93As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him.\94 Colossians 2:6. \93The just shall live by faith.\94 Hebrews 10:38. You gave yourself to God, to be His wholly, to serve and obey Him, and you took Christ as your Saviour. You could not yourself atone for your sins or change your heart; but having given yourself to God, you believe that He for Christ\92s sake did all this for you. By faith you became Christ\92s, and by faith you are to grow up in Him\97by giving and taking. You are to give all\97your heart, your will, your service\97give yourself to Him to obey all His requirements; and you must take all\97Christ, the fullness of all blessing, to abide in your heart, to be your strength, your righteousness, your everlasting helper\97to give you power to obey.
